t: Amazon.com: Lee Kum Kee: About Us
s: What began for Lee Kum Kee in a small fishing village in China has now become a must have brand in kitchens around the globe. An inspiration that turned into something amazing coming from the Seas, using her natural elements to invent the world’s first oyster sauce over 133 years ago.
